## Viewport.remove() method

Remove the element with the given ID from the viewport.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
remove(id: string): void;
```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  id | string |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
